overview: Peter Hodge is Chief Executive Officer and Co-founder of Virsona, Inc. As CEO, Mr. Hodge is responsible for the overall direction and vision of the company and developing partnerships. Mr. Hodge is also a member of the Board of Directors. Prior to co-founding Virsona, Mr. HodgeÂ¹s experience spans more than 20 years in the technology industry with a focus on large, complex computer systems and the economics of the Internet. Mr. Hodge served as a vice president with Cambridge Technology Partners, where he was responsible for the telecommunications and media practice. After Cambridge Technology PartnersÂ¹ acquisition by Novell, Inc. in 2001, Mr. Hodge held various management and sales positions within Novell, primarily focused on business development with Fortune 500 companies in the telecommunications and media sectors. For more than a decade, Mr. Hodge previously also worked for Logic CMG, a systems integration firm. Mr. Hodge graduated with honors from the University of Greenwich, London, England with a B.S. in Computer Science.
